lead_paragraph: Olympic leaders took action on two fronts Wednesday, ramping up efforts to keep drug cheats out of the upcoming Olympics in Rio de Janeiro and recommending the inclusion of baseball-softball and four other sports for the 2020 Tokyo Games.

headline.print_headline: IOC Acts on Doping Crisis; Backs 5 Sports for 2020 Games
headline.main: IOC Acts on Doping Crisis; Backs 5 Sports for 2020 Games
